## Conditional statement if-else

### Perform a task IF a condition holds

<img src="Images/IfStatement.png" style="width: 400px;"/>

---

## Conditional statement if-else

<img src="Images/Conditions.png" style="width: 1000px;"/>

Common mistake: to use *=* instead of *==*

```{r}
i <- 4
if (i == 4){
  print('Yes')
} else {
  print('No')
}
```

## Conditional statement if-else

### Boolean operators & (AND), | (OR), ! (NOT), xor (exclusive OR)

<img src="Images/MoreConditions.png" style="width: 800px;"/>

Common mistakes:

* To use || instead of | (and to use && instead of &)

---

## Conditional statement if-else

```{r}
i <- 4
j <- 5
if(i > 3 & i == j){
  print('Everything\'s true')
} else {
  print('Not everything\'s true')
}

if(i > 3 | i == j){
  print('At least one is true')
} else {
  print('None is true')
}
```
